spec_data.Name: krazy2
spec_data.Description:
Krazy scans KDE source code looking for issues that should be fixed
for reasons of policy, good coding practice, optimization, or any other
good reason.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 03:34:21 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Krazy is a tool for checking code against the KDE coding guidelines
